name: FOPRO LLC
description: Operator of a visual content creation marketplace intended to provide visual content for business projects. The company's marketplace matches professionals specialized in photography, video, virtual reality, drone, or rendering based on project requirements, enabling businesses to reduce manhours and expenses and concentrate on core functions.
